heroBanner.title: THE UPGRADED ECOSYSTEM
heroBanner.subtitle: MetaChain: Build for Bitcoin & Ethereum
heroBanner.desc: Unrivaled innovation and interoperability, without compromising on scalability or security. MetaChain is for building dApps on the world's largest blockchains.

keyFeatures.title: Ethereum's power meets innovation
keyFeatures.subtitle: KEY FEATURES
keyFeatures.desc: Provides an EVM-compatible environment that allows developers, familiar with the Ethereum ecosystem, to seamlessly and effortlessly build next generation applications on the Native DeFiChain.

evmIntegration.title: EVM & UTXO INTEGRATION
evmIntegration.desc: Supports both UTXO and Ethereum account model, providing privacy and simplicity seamlessly.

ecosystem.title: SCALABLE ECOSYSTEM
ecosystem.desc: Unrestricted cross-compatibility empowers DFI users with extensive access to Ethereum and EVM-compatible chains.

transactionFee.title: LOW TRANSACTION FEES
transactionFee.desc: Empowering builders and users with cost-effective transaction fees.

switchingCosts.title: LOW SWITCHING COSTS
switchingCosts.desc: Seamless dApp deployment and effortless cross-chain interaction simplified using MetaChain.

roadmap.title: METACHAIN'S KEY UPDATES
roadmap.subtitle: Roadmap
roadmap.desc: Become an early pioneer in the next frontier of DeFiChain. Explore our roadmap and join us in testing and shaping the features of MetaChain. Leverage our knowledge library below to start your journey.

cards.title: DevNet
cards.desc: Kick-off stage, setting up MetaChain's environment for internal testing.

cards.title: FloppyNet
cards.desc: The alpha version of our TestNet - publicly accessible, expect rollbacks and limited volatility.

cards.title: TestNet
cards.desc: Final version of TestNet - deploy and interact with smart contracts in a stable environment.

cards.title: Infrastructure
cards.desc: Integrating key infrastructure like MetaScan and Ocean to prepare MetaChain for MainNet.

cards.title: MainNet Launch
cards.desc: The official launch - experience MetaChain's fully operational network.

items.title: What is MetaChain?
items.desc: MetaChain is a Layer 2 blockchain that allows users to build scalable dApps on Bitcoin and Ethereum.

items.title: How is MetaChain related to DeFiChain?
items.desc: MetaChain expands the scope for DeFiChain, allowing it to link to various chains by enhancing interoperability.

items.title: How can I build on MetaChain?
items.desc: Refer to the documentation here for more details.

items.title: What token(s) can be used on MetaChain?
items.desc: MetaChain currently only supports native DFI tokens on MetaChain. You may obtain them by swapping DFI UTXO on Light Wallet (feature in progress)
